items.question: What services do you offer?
items.answer: We provide a full range of software solutions, including custom web development, mobile app development (iOS & Android), cloud infrastructure, and AI-driven business automation.

items.question: How long does a typical project take?
items.answer: Project timelines vary depending on complexity. A standard MVP (Minimum Viable Product) usually takes 6-12 weeks, while more complex enterprise solutions can take 4-6 months.

items.question: Do you provide ongoing support after launch?
items.answer: Yes, we offer flexible maintenance and support plans to ensure your software remains secure, up-to-date, and performs optimally as your business grows.

items.question: How do you handle project pricing?
items.answer: We offer both fixed-price contracts for well-defined projects and hourly/retainer models for agile development where requirements may evolve.

items.question: Can you work with our existing internal team?
items.answer: Absolutely! We often collaborate with internal technical teams to provide specialized expertise or extra development capacity to meet tight deadlines.
